wikipedia_page.main: Jamie Garry Stott  is an English footballer who plays for AFC Fylde on loan from Stockport County.

response: On 13 October 2017, Edmundson joined National League side AFC Fylde on a one-month loan deal along with teammate Jamie Stott. After impressing in his loan spell at AFC Fylde, Edmundson returned to Oldham Athletic in January 2018, working his way into the first-team upon his return. He scored his first goal for Oldham on the final day of the 2017–18 season, netting in a 2–2 draw with Northampton Town. He made 17 appearances for Oldham during the season, scoring once.
